name: WEB_VIEW_INFO
description: The WEB_VIEW_INFO table contains information about which users are viewing patient summary extract (LNO) reports from the Web. Data in this table includes the user's id, the user's submitter id, and the exact time the user viewed the report. Each row in this table represents a time that a user has viewed the particular report.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the extract record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: WEB_VIEWER_EMP_ID
columns.description: Keep track of which users (EMP ID) have viewed the Patient Summary Extracts (LNO) from Web Outreach.

columns.name: WEB_VIEWER_EMP_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: WEB_VIEWER_SMT_ID
columns.description: Keep track of the submitter (SMT ID) of the user viewing the Patient Summary Extracts (LNO) from Web Outreach.

columns.name: WEB_VIEWER_SMT_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: WEB_VIEW_DTTM
columns.description: Keep track of when the Patient Summary Extracts (LNO) was viewed from the Web.
